channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Land Where the Vibe Doesn’t Shift
item.description: Ireland, unlike its Anglophone peers, is largely untouched by the conservative backlash to progressive overreach.

item.title: Jamie Dimon breaks with ‘idiots’ in Democratic Party, saying they ‘have big hearts and little brains’
item.description: "They do not understand how the real world works," said the JPMorgan Chase CEO. "Almost every single policy rolled out failed."
